name: @GetAfniView
author: AFNI Developers
description: A tool to retrieve the AFNI view of a given dataset name

inputs.description: Name of the dataset (including path) from which to retrieve the AFNI view (+orig, +acpc, etc.)
inputs.name: Dataset Name

output-files.description: The AFNI view extension retrieved from the dataset name
output-files.name: AFNI View
